body: So I have very recently joined a team of amazing pvpers, great bridgers, awesome rushers, and outstanding defenseman. But I scrimmaged once with them, and I was the reason they lost. None of them pinned the blame on me, but that's probably because I'm new and they would hurt my feelings. I have no idea if I should leave the team to spare them the shame, or if I should keep going, possibly harming them in the future. I really have no idea.

title: Team Letdown

replies.body: I've been playing for about 2 years now, but if there are any tips on getting better, I'm all ears!
replies.body_tagged: I've been playing for about 2 years now, but if there are any tips on getting better, I'm all ears!

replies.body:
learn to w tap, which is when you let go and press "w" quickly after hitting someone
there are many videos of it on youtube
also butterfly click its the easiest thing to do (click with two fingers on one button)

replies.body:
watch tutorials on youtube of how to improve pvp, don't mix with your settings too much and get used to what you're using.
Learn how to w-tap, strafe, maybe jitterclick. idk...
